name: Sq. Empire
description:
Best results when played in fullscreen and with sound How to Play
  • Each player will be assigned with different color
  • Each player will start in opposite corners
  • At the start of the game, tiles that cannot occupied (called mountains) are randomly generated
  • Player(s) has to click their tile to capture the surrounding tiles in an alternate fashion
  • The game ends when all the tiles are captured
  • The player with most tiles at the end of the game wins
Credits Development
  • Unity and C# - https://unity.com/
Art & Images
  • Google Drawings -https://docs.google.com/drawings
  • Pixilart - https://www.pixilart.com/draw
  • Google Fonts - https://fonts.google.com/
Sounds & Music
  • Zapsplat - https://www.zapsplat.com/
  • Ecrett Music - https://ecrettmusic.com/
